sentence.Network_en: To World - weariness : Life is like a tombstone that does not remain intact for long.
sentence.Network_cn: 厌世说: 人生就是那块很快破败的墓碑.

sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

list.abs: will I set up my everlasting rest and shake the yoke of inauspicious stars from this world-wearied flesh ? a dateless bargin to engrossong death !将设置我的永恒的休息和动摇这个世界厌倦肉凶星的枷锁？

over the past decade or so he has cast a world-weary eye over travel , status and architecture , asas writing a fine book about philosophers and an excellent meditation on Proust .过去十来年他厌世的目光已经投向了旅行、社会身份和建筑，以及一本关于哲学家们的很精致的书和一本关于普鲁斯特的沉思录。
A thrill of hope the weary world rejoices ., 希望在悸动 , 困倦的世界欢欣快乐.
a thrill of hope the weary world rejoices , for yonder breaks a new and glorious morn .困倦世人骤获希望真欢欣；因为迎接一荣耀新清晨。
al Pacino plays the world weary retired Army Lt. Colonel who through a stupid accident looses his sight and his way of life .艾尔帕西诺扮演世界厌倦退役陆军中校谁通过一个愚蠢的事故失去了视力和他的生活方式。
